'''My Hand Is For Cooking Only''' is a [[Badges|badge]] that can be obtained by playing the mission [[Toya's Perfection (Ch. 1)]] on the island of [[Angler's Grave]].

Objective: <big style="color:yellow">Toya is not allowed to climb any ladders or ivies.</big>
